content: be 2 both circles should be identical hold the circles together and start wrapping yarn of your choice around both of them it should look like 1 piece wrap and wrap and wrap until you don t see cardboard you can do less if you like a wussy pompom sometimes that actually looks great then take a scissors and cut everything your scissors are running between the cardboard circles the yarn should be held in gauge by the center hole you re then going to take a piece of yarn and tie around the outside of the pompom make this really strong and really tight it s going to hold everything together remove cardboard and laugh at your own genius whoever thought up pompoms should be given a posthumous macarthur award for cultural contributions to peace and joy here are some of the other hats i ve made using this technique/recipe the original forever 21 hat i reknit what i m calling the sun hat with staghorn cable and twisted stockinette at the crown oxo double cable hat with actual earflaps not just a neckpiece if you would like to knit the first hat on the cover image here is the oxo cable as given from walters 1968 a treasury of knitting patterns a panel of 12 stitches which will be big and dynamic and probably 2-3 inches wide in a bulky weight row 1 k2 p8 k2 wrong side row 2 p2 k8 p2 row 3 k2 p8 k2 row 4 p2 sl next 2 stitches to double pointed needle and hold in back k2 then k2 from dpn sl next 2 stitches to dpn and hold in front k2 and then k2 from dpn p2 row 5 -7 repeat row 1 2 and 3 row 8 p2 sl next 2 stitches to dpn and hold in front k2 k2 from dpn sl next 2 stitches to dpn hold in back k2 then k2 from dpn p2 row 9-12 repeat row 5-8 row 13-16 repeat row 1-4 happy knitting it truly is infinitely customizable you can plug in literally any cable stitch you like that has 10-20 stitches in a panel and build things off of that i don t knit hats any other way anymore unless i want to do some color work get in touch if you want my email is ninjaginga@gmail com and my insta non knitting is @gingerlukas ginger lukas 2007-2025
